overview: A disgraced veteran with a troubled past works as a negotiator in a futuristic post-war Korea battling with gangs, robots, and his own grip on reality. In the wake of a Second Korean War, the North and South unify to create one Uniﬁed Korea. Milo, a disgraced veteran of the war with a troubled past ﬁnds work as a negotiator with the HYUN company, the new leader in post-war military technology.
title: Preset
